programme.title: The Diamond Trail
programme.desc: A New York reporter (Rex Bell) follows a gang of gem smugglers west.

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A boy raised by his servant vows to take revenge on the ranchers who killed his parents.

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: An Easterner (George O'Brien) finds rustlers and a sweetheart (Irene Hervey) on the ranch he inherited out West.

programme.title: Hellgate
programme.desc: After the Civil War, ranch owner Gil Hanley helps a stranger in desperate need of medical attention. Soon he is questioned by Union soldiers about the stranger, who turns out to be an ex-Confederate soldier.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: The agents investigate a hanging judge in Oklahoma for the state authorities.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Agents go to Washington territory to investigate an imposter posing as a U.S. Secret Service agent.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate decides it is time for Betty Jo to put down the books and set out to find a significant other.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: A pair of crooks plans to rob the Cannonball of its bank shipment.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho hope to imprison the leader of a rustling ring.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A con man resorts to murder in a phony land promotion scheme.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Elected as mayor, an outlaw deputizes members of his gang.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: A killer escapes from prison and tries to reunite with his girlfriend.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger is shot down in cold blood and Judge and Jeff are determined to break the case.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean
programme.desc: Judge Roy along with Taggart are intrigued by the arrival of Pat O'Hara and much younger wife Kate; Pat's fondess for drink and gambling has him involved with the town's rowdies.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie and Tagg (Gail Davis, Jimmy Hawkins) track a masked bandit who holds up an acrobatic troupe. With Brad Johnson.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) plays matchmaker for her friend Bess Murdock (Nancy Hale). With Don Kennedy, Brad Johnson.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A Tuscarawas brave tries to start a war between his people and the white men.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A young woman with a past and a Seneca Chief attempt to stir the Iroquois into war with the settlers.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights befriend a boy whose father has been sent to jail and whose mother has recently died.

programme.title: Home in Oklahoma
programme.desc: A singing newsman (Roy Rogers), a ranch foreman (George "Gabby" Hayes) and a newswoman (Dale Evans) team up to track killers.

programme.title: Lights of Old Santa Fe
programme.desc: The owner and operator of a rodeo that's an antiquated touring company on its last legs gets an offer from her business rival, to combine their operations -- if she will also consent to be his bride.

programme.title: The Yellow Rose of Texas
programme.desc: Roy takes a job singing aboard a showboat in the hopes of recovering stolen funds and clearing Dale's father.

programme.title: Kentucky Rifle
programme.desc: Stranded settlers (Chill Wills, Lance Fuller, Cathy Downs) enter hostile territory with a wagonload of rifles.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: A baseball star (Lou Gehrig) goes west with his sister (Evalyn Knapp) and helps a lawyer (Smith Ballew) bust a cattle-protection racket.

programme.title: Randy Rides Alone
programme.desc: Government agent Randy Bowers (John Wayne) is accused of shooting up a saloon and has to escape from the jail to find the man behind the murders.

programme.title: Riders of the Whistling Pines
programme.desc: Outlaw lumbermen frame a singing cowboy (Gene Autry) ; his friend (Jimmy Lloyd) saves him with a plane.

programme.title: The Tall Texan
programme.desc: A band of treasure-seekers sets out in search of gold that is reputedly concealed in an Indian burial ground.

programme.title: The Courageous Avenger
programme.desc: A law officer tries to bring a traitorous mine foreman to justice.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) and his sidekick (Russell Hayden) head for South America to deliver cattle.
